workScopeOptions.description: Work scope items organized by project type with building class overrides

combustible_cladding.title: Combustible Cladding
combustible_cladding.description: ACP/ACM cladding replacement requires fire engineering, staging strategy, and regulatory compliance.

asbestos.title: Asbestos Containing Materials
asbestos.description: ACM removal requires licensed removalist, clearance certificates, and WHS compliance.

pfas.title: PFAS Contamination
pfas.description: Per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances require specialist remediation, EPA notification, and extended validation.

contaminated_land.title: Contaminated Land
contaminated_land.description: Site contamination requires environmental assessment, remediation action plan, and site audit.

refrigerant_phase_out.title: Refrigerant Phase-out
refrigerant_phase_out.description: R22 refrigerant is being phased out. Consider upgrading to modern refrigerants during replacement.

high_security.title: High Security Classification
high_security.description: Top Secret/SCI facilities require SCIF construction, cleared workforce, and extended approval timelines.

remote_site.title: Very Remote Location
remote_site.description: Very remote sites add 40%+ to construction costs. Consider modular/prefabrication strategies.

live_operations.title: Live Operational Environment
live_operations.description: Works in live environments require careful staging, safety protocols, and operational coordination.

biosafety_3_plus.title: BSL-3+ Laboratory
biosafety_3_plus.description: High containment laboratories require specialized design, certification, and security protocols.

gmp_manufacturing.title: GMP Manufacturing
gmp_manufacturing.description: Good Manufacturing Practice facilities require validation protocols and TGA/FDA compliance pathways.

heritage_adaptive_reuse.title: Heritage Adaptive Reuse
heritage_adaptive_reuse.description: Adaptive reuse of heritage buildings requires heritage consultant, conservation management plan, and approvals.

critical_infrastructure.title: Critical Infrastructure
critical_infrastructure.description: Critical infrastructure projects require SOCI Act compliance and enhanced security measures.

multi_jurisdictional.title: Multi-Jurisdictional
multi_jurisdictional.description: Projects spanning jurisdictions require coordination across multiple regulatory frameworks.

native_title.title: Native Title Considerations
native_title.description: Sites with native title claims require Indigenous Land Use Agreement (ILUA) or consent processes.

flood_overlay.title: Flood Overlay
flood_overlay.description: Flood-prone land requires hydraulic study, flood-compatible design, and resilience measures.

hotel.description: Hotel or motel for transient accommodation

AU.name: Development Application (DA)
AU.description: Standard planning approval pathway through local council

AU.name: State Significant Development (SSD)
AU.description: Major project approval by NSW Planning

NZ.name: Resource Consent
NZ.description: Planning approval under Resource Management Act

NZ.name: Permitted Activity
NZ.description: Activities complying with district plan rules

UK.name: Full Planning Permission
UK.description: Standard planning application to local planning authority

UK.name: Outline Planning Permission
UK.description: Approval in principle with reserved matters

UK.name: Permitted Development
UK.description: Works permitted under GPDO without full planning

US.name: Conditional Use Permit
US.description: Special use approval in zoning district
